name: Nina Ricci Eau de Perfume
description: This arrives on the market in 2009, as a fragrance for glamorous and urban heroines. It is composed of rhubarb, bergamot, moonflower, Indian tuberose, centifolia rose, patchouli and sandalwood

name: Chanel Chance Parfume
description: Chanel Chance Perfume a floral fragrance in a round bottle. Unpredictable, in perpetual movement, Chanel Chance sweeps you into its whirlwind of happiness and fantasy. An olfactory encounter with chance.

name: Burberry For Women Perfume
description: Burberry Perfume is a striking but minimalist fragrance that honors the city of London and the women who call it their home. It opens with fresh, succulent notes of blackcurrant and fresh green apple

name: Jimmy Choo Blossom Perfume
description: Embody the beauty of spring with the Jimmy Choo Blossom Spray, a fruity floral womens fragrance with woody facets. Top Notes about this are Exotic Fruit Accord, Frangipani Flower, Sandalwood mixture

name: Britney Spears Fantasy In Bloom
description: Fantasy In Bloom Perfume by Britney Spears, released in 2017 . A radiant fruity floral perfume with a great presence. Full of fun and excitement. A terrific choice for a summer or spring scent.

name: Carolina Herrera Good Girl EDP
description: The sweet, breathtaking and alluring qualities of Jasmine, bring a bright of femininity. The Good Girl’s mysterious side is express with richly fragrant Cocoa, Almond and Coffee bring notes of bold vibrancy.

name: BVLGARI Goldea
description: Goldea is a tribute to the golden goddess of beauty and sun. Gold is the divine interpretation of the splendor of the sun on earth. Unique expression of Bulgari perfumes, Goldea is a sensual and oriental fragrance that pays tribute to the olfactory richness

name: Paco Rabanne Black
description: A classic redefined, Black XS for Her by Paco Rabanne features an intense oriental woody accord that breaths new life into the fragrance. Cranberries spiced with tamarind and pink pepper give a sharp sweet and sour taste

name: Gucci Bamboo EDP
description: Top notes of bergamot. Heart notes of casablanca lily and ylang ylang extra-comoros. Base notes of sandalwood.

name: Christian Dior Pure Poison
description: The fragrances of the Poison line take new directions with daring provocation. They are fragrances created to surprise and astonish, to let women assert their femininity with confidence.

name: Chloe Nomade Eau De Perfume
description: The round O-shaped curves of the bottle bring softness, contrasting with the strong, graphic metallic pieces. A sleek collar and a delicate, dangling pink ribbon bring confident yet feminine detail to the elegant design.

name: Prada Luna Rossa Perfume
description: A citrus aromatic fragrance for men Light, crisp, clean, well-balanced & uplifting Top notes of lavender absolute & bitter orange Heart notes of clary sage & spearmint Base notes of ambrette absolute & ambroxan molecule Launched in 2012 Recommended for day time or casual wear

name: lanvin eclat darpege perfume
description: Eclat dArpège is classified as fruity-floral. Lanvinrevives the musical theme of his legendary Arpege perfume. The composition is delicate, fragile and angelic. Eclat d’Arpège’s first accords are green lilac and Sicilian lemon leaves which transports us to the first day of spring

name: Bvlgari Omnia For Women
description: A citrus aromatic fragrance for men Light, crisp, clean, well-balanced & uplifting Top notes of lavender absolute & bitter orange Heart notes of clary sage & spearmint Base notes of ambrette absolute & ambroxan molecule Launched in 2012 Recommended for day time or casual wear

name: Chloe Love Story perfume
description: A fresh floral fragrance neroli, Heart: orange blossom, stephanotis jasmine, Base: cedar wood

name: Mont Blanc Femme
description: Individuelle Perfume by Mont Blanc, This extremely sexy fragrance was created by mont blanc, in 2004. Its magnificent scent includes a mixture of pink bay, redcurrant, lotus, rose, vanilla, musk, and amber

name: Jo Malone Davana
description: The wildness of honeysuckle, winding through the English countryside. Climbing. Twisting. Ever more alluring after dark. Fresh with rose and the aromatic, fruity twist of davana. Woody with moss. Warmed by sunshine.

name: Si Rose Signature
description: Strong. Sensitive. Serene. Discover a floral fragrance that radiates beauty and passion. Delicate and powerful, Sì Eau de Parfum embodies the very essence of todays woman. A woman who says yes to life and happiness.

name: Jadore Dior
description: Jadore Eau de Parfum is an invented bouquet, finely crafted down to the last detail, like a custom-made flower. Essence of Ylang-Ylang from the Comoros unfurls its floral-fruity notes and instills a soft exotic touch. Damascus Rose, sophisticated and exuberant, then comes to warm the senses.

name: Ferrari Scuderia Spray
description: Ideal for daytime wear, this fragrance captures the effortlessly elegant but stylishly sporty feel of ferrari’s speedsters in a bottle. Wear a splash of this cologne to accelerate your confidence and drive your powerful personality home
